overview: Scorpions hit the stage in a sea of lights for opener ‘Sting In The Tail’ and soon proved to Wacken that you don’t need to play fast and furious to be heavy with the slower tracks ‘Make It Real’ and the reggae flavour of ‘Is There Anybody There?’. The set consisted of tracks from ‘Love Drive’ and onwards from when Matthias Jabs became a permanent member of the Scorpions.
title: Scorpions: Wacken 2012
